patterns: Is there construction on the Yellowstone River Bridge?
Will I face delays near Tower Junction?
What's happening at the Yellowstone River Bridge in 2025?
response: Yes, expect up to 30-minute delays near Tower Junction throughout 2025 due to replacement of the aging Yellowstone River Bridge. A new bridge is being built just upstream to improve year-round access. Some trails may close temporarily during work. Use caution and watch for signage.

patterns: What's chip sealing in Yellowstone?

response: Chip sealing is scheduled at various points around the park in 2025. Expect up to 30-minute delays where crews are working. Drive slowly on chip-sealed roads to avoid loose gravel damage and extend the life of your tires and windshield.
